key_risks: Profitability concerns due to high operational expenses and R&D investments
Dependence on the real estate market, making the company vulnerable to market downturns
Intense competition from rivals like Zillow and Cupix
Hardware limitations with expensive professional-grade 3D cameras
Data privacy and security risks associated with handling sensitive spatial data
controversies: Stock volatility reflecting investor uncertainty about profitability
Potential data privacy breaches despite robust security measures
social_issues: Data privacy concerns for enterprise clients and individual users
governance_issues: Scrutiny from investors following the SPAC merger and public listing
